summary: Complete environment with a Cisco Cloud Services Router (CSR) 1000v with 4 subnets.
description: This deployment creates a CSR with 4 NICs, plus public and private subnets. User defined routes are created on the subnets to ensure the CSR is used as the default gateway for virtual machines in the private subnet. Finally, the IP Forwarding flag is set on Azure to allow the CSR to properly pass traffic.  To deploy this template to Azure Government, go to the Quickstart repository via the Browse on GitHub button.
